Popover is a popup control which can contain any HTML markup and be applied even to in-line

Usage:

                
        <div class="col-xs-6 well"
             xui-popover-placement="right"
             xui-popover-title="{{shell.popover.textToBind}}"
             xui-popover="It can be also any box element and contain controls with binding.">
            <div class="col-xs-3">
                <xui-icon icon="calendar" icon-size="large"></xui-icon>
            </div>
            <div class="col-xs-9">
                <form>
                    <xui-textbox caption="Change me:" ng-model="shell.popover.textToBind"></xui-textbox>
                </form>
            </div>
        </div>

Code samples

Popover can contain any HTML markup and be applied even to in-line
If you have any additional questions about xui-popover , please refer to Solarwinds Knowledge Base
.

Note this popover has no title.
trigger example
click
(default)
focus I am popover, triggered on focus!
mouseenter I am popover, triggered on mouseenter!


Note that xui-popover-placement attribute sets the placement with highest priority. Placement autodetection will work any way.
